snippet.title: Trackmaster Trailer
snippet.description:
Challenge your friends to a chaotic race on procedurally generated levels. Never play the same track twice! Master tricky obstacles, find shortcuts and use an arsenal of different powerups. Experience a dynamic environment with moving blocks, water physics and changing weather.

Features:

Procedurally generated tracks: All tracks are randomly generated. Choose your difficulty level and track length. Never play the same track twice!

Multiplayer: Compete against your friends in chaotic races! Make use of an arsenal of different powerups or simply push your opponent off the road.

Dynamic environment: Dynamic weather and water simulation. Race during the night or be washed away by a wave during a storm!

Choose between four different cars: Paint your car, equip a hat, and choose an annoying horn. Beware that each car has different weaknesses and disadvantages!

Master tricky obstacles: Trackmaster includes a large number of different track parts. Learn how to drive in loops and rotating barrels.

Be aware of your surroundings: This is no ordinary racing game. Finding the way is just as important as driving skills. A smart shortcut may win you the game!
